title: Unspecified Error While Updating
body: Ok, so, I turned off gamebar like the guy said, but now league wont even open, I logged in, the client exited, and now it is stuck updating at 33%, with 0 files scanned, please help again =)

replies.body: There was a live service incident with the Patching service at the time you submitted this post that has since been resolved. Let me know if you're still having issues patching.
Switch to EU West server, close the client, open it again and it will update.
Click on the gears to go to setting, uncheck the peer to something.
